member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.FilterHttpRequestMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets a filter function that determines whether or not to collect telemetry on a per request basis.
member.remarks:
FilterHttpRequestMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using . Notes:
The return value for the filter function is interpreted as:
If filter returns , the request is collected.
If filter returns or throws an exception the request is NOT collected.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.EnrichWithHttpRequestMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets an action to enrich an with .

para.b: EnrichWithHttpRequestMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using .

member.summary: Gets or sets an action to enrich an with .

para.b: EnrichWithHttpResponseMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using .

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.EnrichWithException
member.summary: Gets or sets an action to enrich an with .

para.b: EnrichWithException is called for all runtimes.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.FilterHttpWebRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets a filter function that determines whether or not to collect telemetry on a per request basis.
member.remarks:
FilterHttpWebRequest is only executed on .NET Framework runtimes. and on .NET Framework are both implemented using . Notes:
The return value for the filter function is interpreted as:
If filter returns , the request is collected.
If filter returns or throws an exception the request is NOT collected.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.RecordException
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether exception will be recorded as an or not. Default value: .

para.b: RecordException is supported on all runtimes.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientTraceInstrumentationOptions.DisableUrlQueryRedaction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the url query value should be redacted or not.
member.remarks: The query parameter values are redacted with value set as Redacted. e.g. `?key1=value1` is set as `?key1=Redacted`. The redaction can be disabled by setting this property to .

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource
member.summary: Hooks into the class reflectively and writes diagnostic events as requests are processed.
member.remarks: Inspired from the System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource.HttpHandlerDiagnosticListener class which has some bugs and feature gaps. See https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/33732 for details.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.ServicePointHashtable
member.summary: Helper class used for ServicePointManager.s_ServicePointTable. The goal here is to intercept each new ServicePoint object being added to ServicePointManager.s_ServicePointTable and replace its ConnectionGroupList hashtable field.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.ConnectionGroupHashtable
member.summary: Helper class used for ServicePoint.m_ConnectionGroupList. The goal here is to intercept each new ConnectionGroup object being added to ServicePoint.m_ConnectionGroupList and replace its m_ConnectionList arraylist field.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.ArrayListWrapper
member.summary: Helper class used to wrap the array list object. This class itself doesn't actually have the array elements, but rather access another array list that's given at construction time.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.ConnectionArrayList
member.summary: Helper class used for ConnectionGroup.m_ConnectionList. The goal here is to intercept each new Connection object being added to ConnectionGroup.m_ConnectionList and replace its m_WriteList arraylist field.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.HttpWebRequestArrayList
member.summary: Helper class used for Connection.m_WriteList. The goal here is to intercept all new HttpWebRequest objects being added to Connection.m_WriteList and notify the listener about the HttpWebRequest that's about to send a request. It also intercepts all HttpWebRequest objects that are about to get removed from Connection.m_WriteList as they have completed the request.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.Implementation.HttpWebRequestActivitySource.AsyncCallbackWrapper
member.summary: A closure object so our state is available when our callback executes.
